about: Aspiring computer engineer pursuing a B.Tech at KJ Somaiya Institute of Technology, Mumbai. Passionate about full-stack web development, cloud computing, and machine learning. With leadership experience as Treasurer of IETE and involvement in community service through NSS, I excel in teamwork and project management. Skilled in Python, Java, C++, and SQL, I have contributed to impactful projects like Somaiya Club Connect and GameOn. Dedicated to continuous learning and building innovative solutions that drive meaningful impact.
